metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14853 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An error-handling flaw was found in python-ecdsa before version 0.13.3. During signature decoding, malformed DER signatures could raise unexpected exceptions (or no exceptions at all), which could lead to a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14853` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-ecdsa - 0.13-2ubuntu0.16.04.1
python3-ecdsa - 0.13-2ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: python-ecdsa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13-2ubuntu0.16.04.1').
